item.title: Alibaba Cloud ACK supports both public and private SLB
item.author: wzdushu@gmail.com (wanzi)
item.description: 1. Background There is an ACK cluster Successfully deployed Nginx ingress controller and bound to the public network SLB Note: The Kubernetes cluster created through the Alibaba Cloud Container Service Management Console will automatically deploy a set of Nginx Ingress Controllers during initialization, which is mounted on the public network SLB instance by default. 2.
